title: Wella Brilliance Treatment for Fine , 5.07 oz
description: What it is: For Color Treated Hair. Makes colored hair supple and soft while increasing shine with Liquid Crystal Technology. What it does: Instantly helps restore and enhance vibrancy of colored hair. What else you need to know: Please do not allow water to remain in the jar after use.

title: WELLA Brilliance Shampoo & Conditioner Fine to Normal Coloured Hair, Liter Duo 33.8 oz
description: Repair and protect dry and damaged hair to leave it full of with vitality. Task-specific products Enrich Moisturising Conditioner for fine to normal hair
